Sept. 13, 1902 D Galston Contest
Galston Contest 0 Test Piece Contest

Mercadante
Galston, East Ayrshire, Scotland, UK March contest - 1st Milnwood, 2nd Coltness, 3rd Newmilns.. Adjudicators remarks for Galston include - this band requires a lot more practice. ---- there seems to have been a solo for a singer, I have heard the conductor all the way through. 5 bands competed, .
July 11, 2018, 3:42 p.m. July 11, 2018, 3:49 p.m.
1 Milnwood 2nd L.R.E John McCubbrey
2 Newmilns Burgh Silver William Smith
3 Newmains Edward Sutton
4 Larkhall Raploch David Jones
5 Galston William Smith
